subject: Order #SSN3614 confirmed
description_text: We apologize for the inconvenience. Shipping to Brazil is prohibitively expensive, costing approximately $131. We require you to cover the additional $46 shipping fee. We will ship your order at cost price. If you agree, please click this link to complete payment. https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference-1

conversations.body_text:
Hey there,
when i go to the link, it shows it as a product called "difference", and
it's 8 dollars instead of the 46. Also, i got an email saying the pedals
were in transit. What's going on? I don't know what to do, the payment link
is wrong and the pedals are supposedly shipping.

Em sex., 28 de nov. de 2025 08:45, support@simsonn.com
Hi Davizinhobeltrao,    You can click the link to make the payment.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference-1

Ok, thank you.
Just one thing, as said in my response, I got another email saying the
pedals were already shipping.
What would happen if I didn't pay this? Would they get blocked at customs?

Em ter., 9 de dez. de 2025 Ã s 08:26, support@simsonn.com <

Hi Davizinhobeltrao,    Due to your prolonged delay in payment, we have decided to ship your order first. However, you will still be required to cover the additional shipping costs. Thank you for your understanding.

Ok, i will go through with the payment as soon as i sort everything out,
worst case is by tomorrow night, maybe even today. Just one thing, this is
guaranteed to be the last payment I'll need to make, right? And it won't
get blocked at customs for it?

Em qua., 10 de dez. de 2025 03:23, support@simsonn.com
Hi Davizinhobeltrao,    Okay, thank you for your understanding.

You guys didn't answer my last question. Is this guaranteed to be the last
payment I'll need to make and is this guaranteed to make the pedals pass
through brazilian customs?

Em sex., 12 de dez. de 2025 00:54, support@simsonn.com
Hi Davizinhobeltrao,    Shipments to Brazil may be subject to customs duties, but we have declared the value as low for you.
